text: ï»¿A lone explorer on a mission to reveal the grandeur of Saturn, its rings and moons.
After 20 years in space, NASA's Cassini spacecraft is running out of fuel.
And so, to protect moons of Saturn that could have conditions suitable for life,...
...a spectacular end has been planned for this long-lived traveler from Earth.
In the skies of Saturn, the journey ends...
...as Cassini becomes part of the planet itself.
